# Investor FAQs

## Where is BloomZ, Inc. headquartered?

Akasaka, Tokyo

[![Icon - Elements Webflow Library - BRIX Templates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66998cff4831e1508c4f1eed/66998cff4831e1508c4f1f2d_chevron-right-icon-elements-brix-templates.svg)](#)

### Where is BloomZ, Inc. Incorporated? 

Cayman Islands

[![Icon - Elements Webflow Library - BRIX Templates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66998cff4831e1508c4f1eed/66998cff4831e1508c4f1f2d_chevron-right-icon-elements-brix-templates.svg)](#)

### When is BloomZ, Inc.'s fiscal year end? 

September 30

[![Icon - Elements Webflow Library - BRIX Templates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66998cff4831e1508c4f1eed/66998cff4831e1508c4f1f2d_chevron-right-icon-elements-brix-templates.svg)](#)

### What is BloomZ, Inc.'s stock symbol and exchange listing? 

NasdaqCM: BLMZ

[![Icon - Elements Webflow Library - BRIX Templates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66998cff4831e1508c4f1eed/66998cff4831e1508c4f1f2d_chevron-right-icon-elements-brix-templates.svg)](#)

### Who is BloomZ, Inc.'s transfer agent? 

Transhare Corporation

[![Icon - Elements Webflow Library - BRIX Templates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66998cff4831e1508c4f1eed/66998cff4831e1508c4f1f2d_chevron-right-icon-elements-brix-templates.svg)](#)

### Who is BloomZ, Inc.'s independent auditor? 

TAAD LLP

[![Icon - Elements Webflow Library - BRIX Templates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66998cff4831e1508c4f1eed/66998cff4831e1508c4f1f2d_chevron-right-icon-elements-brix-templates.svg)](#)

### Who is BloomZ, Inc.'s outside legal counsel? 

Hunter Taubman Fischer & Li LLC

[![Icon - Elements Webflow Library - BRIX Templates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66998cff4831e1508c4f1eed/66998cff4831e1508c4f1f2d_chevron-right-icon-elements-brix-templates.svg)](#)
